<!here|@here> wanted to follow up on the announcement about the Diversity Committee made at AHM yesterday. Here’s the deal: 

After attending diversity and inclusion workshops offered by the PDC we wanted to keep the momentum going at Uncorked, and formed the DC. This committee is meant to be open to anyone who wants to join, and your level of participation is completely up to you (i.e. join for one meeting and not the next). The committee will be responsible for proposing policy changes, planning events, and generally talking about what diversity and inclusion means to Uncorked. 

Our next meeting is Wed July 13th where we’ll be planning our very first workshop. The focus of the workshop is going to be getting the official Uncorked Diversity and Inclusion mission statement written up, and it’s happening July 19th. We’d love to have as many of you as possible join in to the committee and the workshop!
Ah, I am in San Bruno, feel better not knowing about it :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U02F9CXTL|jstrand> has joined the channel
Hello from lovely San Bruno! Possible to add me to the calendar too?
Monthly committee meetings are now on the team calendar thanks to <@U0HS41J3Y> (every month on the 1st), I think we are going to put the 13th on there as well
13th meeting on the team cal!

<!channel>: Hey! Jared from PDC sent me a survey for feedback on the latest change agent workshop. Does anyone who attended that have anything they’d like me to add in response to these two questions: 1. What was the most important or useful thing you learned at the Change Agent workshop? 2. Please share any  additional thoughts about the workshop series and how it could be improved.
I got the survey too :slightly_smiling_face: I’ll just put my answers there.
